p: Expression levels of VATA, GPDA, HSP70, 1433Z, UCHL1, and ALF were confirmed using Western blotting ( Fig. 6). Expression levels of VATA, HSP70, 1433Z, UCHL1, and ALF were significantly up-regulated in RGE-treated D. melanogaster versus wild type. Although GPDA expression appeared to be lower in RGE-treated flies, this was not significant. These results of Western blotting are consistent with those of the 2-DE MALDI-TOF MS/MS analysis.
